website_summaries.verdict: With a gel pad strap and a copper compression sleeve, this complete tennis elbow solution covers all the bases. Excellent value for the money.
pros: Includes copper-infused sleeve and elbow support strap
Sleeve speeds up recovery and offers relief by providing soothing compression and boosting blood flow
Adjustable strap is sleek and compact and boasts an extra-wide gel pad for additional support and targeted pain relief
cons: Velcro straps can wear out over time, but this is a universal issue with this method of fastening rather than a brand-specific problem

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price. Order the larger size...
customer_reviews.text: These are great but tend to run a little small. I thought I measured correctly and ordered a Larger size than I needed but I should have ordered 2 sizes larger. Apparently I have bigger arms than the average female. What I ended up doing is cutting off the top elastic part that goes above the elbow and it's fine. This is a great deal because it comes with the velcro tennis elbow band also. This is excellent quality with the added bonus of the copper infusion. This compression sleeve is very breathable and I can feel the air moving even through my jacket. I ordered two boxes--one for each elbow as they were both bothering me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Goyette

customer_reviews.title: He still had to do things so I though about a sleeve and while checking it out I saw that wrap around brace and figured the combination would be perfect. Happy to say I was right he wore ...
customer_reviews.text: My son was having problems with, so called, tennis elbow and he had a hard time getting it to heal. He still had to do things so I though about a sleeve and while checking it out I saw that wrap around brace and figured the combination would be perfect. Happy to say I was right he wore the combo for a couple of weeks and found the pain where the brace was, was gone. Now he just wears the sleeve when working and is back to normal. It worked great for him not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Okay but probably not the best for me...
customer_reviews.text: This compression brace worked OK for me but the compression strap was rather uncomfortable. The primary pressure point is a thicker pad but the strap is a bit too thin and actually caused more pain where the strap mates with the connector. At first I thought it was too tight, but even after adjusting it was still causing too much pain. I ended up giving this to a friend who seemed to like it just fine. I ended up with the Body Glove strap which is much wider and has a more comfortable design.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Thought tennis elbow was for athletes, who knew...?
customer_reviews.text: Started using the day it arrived, & has taken that constant annoying pain away the same day. Used both brace & sleeve the 1st day, now just use one, depending what kind of activity I'm doing. I'm not athletic, so tennis elbow was never a thought, I kept taking pain meds, muscle rubs, & massaging; nothing worked, just seemed to get worse. I do most of the heavy house work, & with me just started going back to the gym, it accelerated. Thanks to this I get relief again.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel L Perez

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a while, cheap velcro
customer_reviews.text: Product works great and helps tremendously while new. After a couple of months of use, however, the velcro is no longer adhering to itself like it should and it has become very difficult to keep the band in place. Even small amounts of movement will cause the velcro to release and the band to fall off. It's still ok if I want to use it while inactive, but at this point it's pretty much useless as a sports/exercise brace.
customer_reviews.author: L. Myhan

customer_reviews.title: This was very useful in healing from tendonitis
customer_reviews.text: This was very useful in healing from tendonitis. It was still a bit large for my arm. It worked, but the Velcro is at its most extended position. I am 5'6", 126lbs. It worked better at first, but after adjusting it many times for about two months, the Velcro wasn't sticking as well as it did when I first got it. But I do not need it as much now as I did for the last two months. I will wash it and hang on to it in case I need it again. It was comfortable and easy to move around in, and definitely made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: BOOM BABY!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried multiple different options to help with rather severe tendonitis in both of my elbow/arms. Too uncomfortable,...ineffective. Decided to give this product a try and was really pleased that I did. Very comfortable fit, comes with the compression sock for your arm with the tension band included. All fit snug yet comfortable and I have already noticed some actual relief. #thankful customer.
customer_reviews.author: kurtthekraut

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeve, but the Elbow Brace randomly pops comes off
customer_reviews.text: The compression sleeve is good, but the elbow brace keeps flying off. The velcro will come undone randomly which contributes to this. I ordered an XL based on my measurements, but it is a bit too big, so you may want to go one size smaller than the measurements to get a proper fit. I emailed their customer service and got no reply, other than​ lots of spam, so they were no help. Hope you have a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, adjustable, effective
customer_reviews.text: When I unboxed it, I did not think it was going to work well because the sleeve is thin and looked to be inexpensive. But I was pleasantly surprised. I have used lateral epicondylitis/tennis elbow braces, and this one is as good, or better, than all the previous devices I’ve used. It’s supportive, adjustable, and the two-piece set up makes it much easier to use and adjust. My tennis elbow is almost completely healed now, and this brace was a big part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Howard

customer_reviews.title: The funny thing about "tennis elbow" is that is more likely ...
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to try anything to stop the pain in my arm. The funny thing about "tennis elbow" is that is more likely to be caused from something other than a racquet. I knew my arm hurt, but the second I tried hitting the ball with a racquetball racquet in my hand, I nearly dropped the thing in pain. Now it has since been better, but still a nagging pain. I don't know much about copper infusion, maybe a little about compression, but I can say that I notice the pain a whole lot less when I'm wearing the brace. The good folks at WIMI seem to believe in their products... seems that I do too.
customer_reviews.author: UBNelson

customer_reviews.title: Fast relief for “Golfers Elbow” and repetitive strain injuries
customer_reviews.text: I had had pain from “golfers elbow” (presumed injury from repetive motion while boxing training) for around a week and it was getting worse. I found this product after reading about the benefits of using a counter weight on the painful area. I noticed relief the first day, having worn it for seven or eight hours. By the fourth day I was only wearing the support and brace for three or four hours. Feels much better, well made and effective product, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today but I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been suffering from tennis elbow for the first time in my life for the last two weeks. I bought a few different braces from The Big Box store and nothing quite offered enough support, and many of them killed my Mobility. I put this thing on and went out to the Rock Climbing Gym and i was able to actually climb. I wasn't working on my project because I didn't want to force it but I was still able to come by 5.10c. It was Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: Put your ligament to rest
customer_reviews.text: I injured my forearm doing heavy lifting at work, doctor said get a carpel splint. Started wearing this elbow brace on Saturday as soon as it arrived. By the next day my ligament was actually starting to feel better. I wear this all the time, take it off a few hours in the evening, I am hoping that this will assist the ligament in the healing process by limiting the stress on it. Looking forward to great results.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Irby

customer_reviews.title: Great for Golf - Does not slip while swinging
customer_reviews.text: After reading dozens of reviews on compression sleeves, I finally made my decision and purchased this one. I use it for golf and weight training, my concern was not for weight training but I was more worried about the ability of the sleeve to stay in place during a golf swing. Very happy with this sleeve, there is no movement or readjustment while playing golf, it is light weight too so it will not bother me in the summer months. I am recovering from a bicep tear, so this sleeve gives me the compression and confidence I was looking for. Highly recommend for sports as well as weight training.
customer_reviews.author: TonyG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brace
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made elbow brace. My arm measured 12.5 so I purchased the Large and it fits very nicely. The compression feels just right to me, snug but not too tight. I am using it to help with Golfers Elbow and it seems to be just the support needed. Communication from the company has been fantastic as the owner, Emily, has emailed me to make sure I was satisfied with the purchase and provide tips for its use. Great product from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: JBGraham64

customer_reviews.title: Pain Noticeably Reduced
customer_reviews.text: As a competitive bodybuilder, I am in the gym all the time, pushing hard & lifting heavy weights. My elbow has been burning and aching to levels of extreme pain for the last few months. When wearing this product it makes a noticeable difference. The pain doesn't hit as early in my workout and it doesn't hit as hard or as long after. I would recommend this product to anyone who has elbow pain. I did have to get a size larger than I thought so it wouldn't cut off the circulation of my bicep, so if in doubt, order a size up. Nice material, easy to wear and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: rwoods

customer_reviews.title: Really gives relief for tennis elbow pain. The separate velcro band would be improved with more adjustment range-for small arm.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife, who was suffering from tennis elbow pain. Both parts of this kit (the sleeve and the band) work together to significantly reduce pain, and restore somewhat normal function to her arm. The sleeve is easy to clean and air dry. The pressure band that was included with this, needs a better range of adjustment. It barely gets small enough for her arm, but the elastic sleeve seems to be perfectly sized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I later purchased one with a little air packet and a wider band that worked much better.
customer_reviews.text: The band is too narrow and became uncomfortable (cut off circulation) when it was tight enough to provide relief. I later purchased one with a little air packet and a wider band that worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Sunfish

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Helped tremendously with a pulled ligament. The compression sleeve helped by applying a light & even pressure throughout my forearm, and the band did the rest of the work of immobilising the site of the injury while it healed. I wore for two straight weeks, and the healing is complete! I still slip it on occasionally when performing strenuous activity. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: King Monty

customer_reviews.title: the service from this vendor is great. I
customer_reviews.text: As many people say on here, the service from this vendor is great. I, however, did not like the product. The strap is held in place by a thin rectangular piece of plastic. I am sort of skinny so have to try to tighten the strap quite a bit to provide compression. However, when I try this, the rectangular plastic piece turns sideways and I am unable to achieve the tightness I need. So, it doesn't work for me at all :-/
customer_reviews.author: Kimberle

customer_reviews.title: Would be looking for other products in their line..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.. I started Archery and my bow hand (left hand) elbow has been through a lot due to playing cricket in my younger years. Training to hold a bow the proper way takes some getting used to so that it becomes natural and us really hard to break out... This helps my forearm and elbow during the recovery phase. Shout out to the makers for the helpful mail with instructions and personal recovery assistance.
customer_reviews.author: DelKar

customer_reviews.title: I was truly amazed, unfortunately the sleeve was the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed tennis elbow and it went from an occasionally pain to a chronic pain very quickly. After doing some research on the problem I began doing various exercises and went on amazon to purchase an elbow brace. Being leery of this item actually helping I chose this one for the price and for the sleeve combination. The brace alleviated the pain almost instantly, I was truly amazed, unfortunately the sleeve was the wrong size. With a quick email they responded to me and a new one was on its way. 5 stars for a great product and amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dogged

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trying to figure out what is causing my wrist pain. A physical therapist suggested it's actually an elbow or tendon problem. I've worn the brace for a couple of days and it's working. Anyhow, I got the product really quick (thanks amazon!) and the quality of the elbow brace and sleeve are really good. I don't feel as if they will wear out anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tanakali

customer_reviews.title: This is the best brace I have used for my tendonitis ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brace I have used for my tendonitis ever. I like how aggressive the Velcro is and I'm sure it will last far longer than the others I've used in the past. It is also much more comfortable than the others I have used. I completely forget I'm wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: GoneFishin'

customer_reviews.title: One day of use and these are already helping.
customer_reviews.text: This fit exactly as described on the order page when following the measurement descriptions. I have worn this one day and the support given has already made a huge difference in how my elbow and forearm feel. I was headed to the doctor next which was going to cost be a $80 co-pay just for the visit. The price of these for the relief I have already gotten is a now brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Krieg

customer_reviews.title: Quality for good price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, arrived quickly and just as described. Looks really cool too my wife likes how it looks on me. I've been using it for two days now and from what I can tell as of now is a huge amount of relief from my tennis elbow pain!! And the owner Emily seems totally eager to help in any way with any issues , should they arise. Really good product and will definitely buy again. Quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Verified user!

customer_reviews.title: No more tennis elbow!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and the company. I received an email with a booklet on "tennis elbow", how to properly wear the product (not medical advice), and a follow up email. I lift weights regularly and work in an office - this "injury" is going to happen. I have used other braces in the past, but this is the complete deal. It has the compression and the band to help alleviate the pain and treat the problem from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: PA Dutch Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not sizes well.
customer_reviews.text: This is flimsy and the brace is hard to work. I found a 3m Velcro elbow wrap that is much better. My daughter uses the arm sleeve to warm up since I don't use it. Also this thing would never fit a big guy with big arms even though it was the biggest size. It didn't fit my arm very well. But my size 6 daughter slides it on easily. Sorry can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbeth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it every day for several weeks and the relief is amazing, however the only negative feedback I can give is that the end of the strap is no longer holding in place. However I would order this product time and time again to get the relief!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve is good for light duty but clamp on brace is better for hard duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought a copper infused sleeve from another manufacturer and it stretched out losing the firm grip on my elbow that I wanted. This one so far seems to hold it's tension better. The clamp on brace is what seems to be working best for my elbow. I use the compression sleeve for light duty but the clamp on brace with the compression sleeve seems to work the best for when I play golf. Hopefully this will allow me to continue to play golf while my tendinitis is healing.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable, and gives good support taking some pressure off ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have elbow tendonitis from working out. It does help relieve some pain with most exercises I do, but there are still a few exercises I still cannot do even with this sleeve and elbow bracelet. It's comfortable, and gives good support taking some pressure off your tendon.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove and helps relieve pain!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve (and the brace!) fit very well, and I'm already feeling less pain. I love the e-book that comes with the purchase as well - all of this has helped my tennis elbow tremendously. Great product, great company!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: it is ok, still debating if i am going to keep it. it fits well but as soon as i start moving around, it starts rolling down on me and then it puts too much pressure on my arm and it hurts, trying to figure out how to stop if from rolling up..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The copper sleeve and elbow brace helped my husband, so I thought I would give it a try. I have no idea why, but it worked for me too, and right away I felt some relief. I am able to hide it under a loose 3/4 shirt sleeve and it is comfortable. This seller provided me stellar customer service on an issue I had, and I wouldn't hesitate to shop them again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It works and the owner truly cares about reducing your pain!
customer_reviews.text: Not only has this compression sleeve and elbow brace combo helped reduce my tennis elbow pain significantly over the 3 days I have been using it, but the owner is super enthusiastic about helping elbow pain sufferers conquer it. She has already contacted me twice to ensure I am properly using the product and to provide really helpful tips for reducing my pain. If you have elbow pain and are looking for a product to try, this is the one! Big kudos to Emily for not only getting this product out there, but also truly having a passion for helping others reduce pain! Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer A Weiss

customer_reviews.title: If you could design the product with small pocket and ...
customer_reviews.text: If you could design the product with small pocket and supply 2-3 kind of size, small ball to adjust the massage height and volume, by putting these small balls to pouch then put pouch into pocket, it will expand more application than current hard cusion only. (bean size of small of 1/8"- 1/4" size) I am using it to ease golf swing mascle pain of arm. Current product is acceptable as it is, it already work well on my arm pain and pain is gone now in three days. But above application could expand more user to apply. but could be used for garden or yard work mascle pain too.
customer_reviews.author: Koshiro Hashimoto

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: If you have tennis elbow, I highly recommend this product. We bought another elbow brace but this one comes with the sleeve and a brace. My husband wears this every day! The company is great too and even sent an email with additional information on tennis elbow.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: This is very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable to wear. My tendinitis aches all day. This helps me not think about it during the day. I love the little gel pack.I finally have some comfort. Thank you so much! I might even have to buy another for my now aching other arm.
customer_reviews.author: shanny

customer_reviews.title: Tired of your pain? Here is the answer.
customer_reviews.text: Very rarely does a company far exceed my expectations. Emily has so surprised me. Prior to even getting the product she sent info on how to stay healthy. Tendon healthy. That blew me away! Next, the product worked! Right away. Right away. Did all of the pain go away? Nope. But 95% did. My Tendonitis starter over 25 years ago building Log homes in Utah. This is the first combination that has EVER WORKED. I am sure it will wear out. I am already planning on buying two more, as spares. If they had 6 stars on Amazon, I would have given Emily 6. Great product Emily. Thanks, Dave
customer_reviews.author: B.N.S.T.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit very good
customer_reviews.text: Fits terrible. When you try and tighten the strap the plastic clips would turn sideways from the pressure of tightening the strap. Not a very good design.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Demaio

customer_reviews.title: Two pads give better pressure and relief
customer_reviews.text: I am a full time hairstylist, which means I am constantly over stressing my arms. I also do a lot of heavy work at home as well I have severe tendonitis in both of my arms, and these have given me enough support and relief to get through the day. Keep in mind that these haven't made it go away, but they have surely benefited me over the short period of time I have used them. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the band would be more effective with a pad on each side versus one. Two pads give better pressure and relief . Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Amazing customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought a size too small and figured it was my mistake so I bought another a size larger. The owner of the company sent me a full refund for the first sleeve without asking for me to return the merchandise. This is excellent customer service! The product seems to be high quality. I CrossFit, so I plan to use it well. I have only used it once so far and it seems to help manage the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffstorm

customer_reviews.title: Eh, maybe it works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a lot of experience with injuries and braces. I can’t actually tell if this product works or not. It’s not like my tennis elbow felt better immediately after I put it on. On the other hand, it is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. Have had the sleeve on for about a half hour. I instantly noticed a cooling sensation that was good. It's a bit long, little snug on bicep, but barely noticeable on lower arm. I hope to alleviate pain while paddling and swimming for an upcoming vacation. I have tendonitis or a tendon tear from a round of Levaquin antibiotics that has been very painful for more than a month. Daily activities have been difficult and I hope to find some relief soon.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Really helped!
customer_reviews.text: My husband does heavy construction, and thinks he is getting tendinitis. He felt IMMEDIATE relief when he put these on. I would definitely recommend this arm sleeve and strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jetskier

customer_reviews.title: Nice product,  excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I am very happy with this purchase and feel it working on my golfer elbow. I'm very impressed with the excellent service. I ordered a large and the compression sleeve was a little too big for me. The owner proactively reached out and helped me with a replacement. I always appreciate a company that stands behind their products and puts in extra efforts to ensure the best possible customer experience. Thank you. - Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: BErickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made elbow brace. Make sure that you measure your arm so you purchase the correct size. I did and mine fits perfect. The compression feels just right to me, snug but not too tight. I am using it to help with Golfers Elbow and it is helping. Communication from the company has been fantastic. Great product from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Schleicher

customer_reviews.title: Tennis elbow
customer_reviews.text: I recently was told that I have Tennis Elbow. My doctor gave me a brace that really didn't help with the pain at all. I decided to buy this elbow brace and compression sleeve. I put it on the second it came in and I feel a big difference by just wearing the sleeve. I wore the brace with the sleeve and it works great. It is comfortable and once you have it one you can't tell that it's there.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN ROMERO JR

customer_reviews.title: Used for Tennis Elbow, small arms
customer_reviews.text: So far, it is helping but I've had tennis elbow for 16 months and I really need something to work. I've only had 4 days, but I am wearing the sleeve all the time. The band I'm wearing during the day. It is better quality and stays in place better than the last one I had. I have small arms so that is why I switched brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the elbow sleeve was too tight (and I have very ...
customer_reviews.text: the elbow sleeve was too tight (and I have very thin arms), it made my hand swell. But the brace itself, is a miracle. ever since I started using it (at work, scrolling all day), no more pain!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I did this already
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I did this already, but great brace really helped out with my golfers elbow. Sometime I can just wear the compression sleeve and be fine. Good quality, if you use it a lot I noticed some of the stitching on the brace is getting frayed from the Velcro. I would buy another one tho I like this brace cuz I can put it on myself fast delivery thanks guys
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: What a great company. Ordered this at a great price
customer_reviews.text: What a great company. Ordered this at a great price, then got a personal email from Emily, the owner, thanking me for the order, as well as sending me a pdf of things that can help with my tennis elbow. Arrived in a day in good shape exactly as advertised. Already used it in the gym today with great results. I highly recommend the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: don maher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and effective
customer_reviews.text: Material is high quality. I like that it includes a compression sleeve and strap brace. I wear the sleeve by itself mostly, but sometimes add the strap. Included e-book was helpful. It has helped with my golfer’s elbow. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Great service, well made products.
customer_reviews.text: These products are very well made. The sleeve fits very well and seems to be effective in my first use. My problem is "golf elbow", pain in the tendon on the inside of my elbow, rather than tennis elbow [outside of elbow]. I am not clear how to wear the brace for that. First trial didn't seem to do much. One improvement would be a user guide with pictures or diagrams showing correct placement. The service in fulfilling my order was very good.
customer_reviews.author: bryn mawrer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have been using the sleeve for CrossFit and it really alleviates the pain. Will try the band on my next tennis match which it will be Saturday. Quick delivery, good price and quality product. Note: I paid for it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Martins

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews but I was inspired to do so this time. I ordered a large and it fit perfectly. I really liked the combo packaging because I didn't know what item was best. The price was great and I received it right away. I will recommend this to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for me
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve was uncomfortable and I couldn't get the brace adjusted well enough to provide proper compression. Returned and ordered the Tennis & Golfers Elbow Brace Strap With 1/4" Thick Firm Support (worked much better for me.)
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I pulled the tendon in my right arm ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I pulled the tendon in my right arm to the point of where it was painful all the time. I couldn't work out, with the exception of running, and even that movement hurt. I did some research, found this product and gave it a shot. I took a chance and resumed my routine wearing the brace. Little to no pain! It's not magic, but a compression plus the brace. It did the job as intended. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Neil Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love the product which has been hurting so much
customer_reviews.text: I love the product which has been hurting so much! I wore it and the pain was gone... but I was disappointed that the book from the picture did not come with the product. I was waiting for the book to learn more about the tennis elbows which I am suffering from... It should not be in the picture if they are not going to send it. I thought the price included the book which I assumed from the picture only.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kim

customer_reviews.title: I am sure I am not supposed to sleep with it (and I didn't) but I do feel that my arm was less painful during the overnight and
customer_reviews.text: Got it two days ago. Definitely provides relief to the slight ache I am feeling in my upper forearm. It also seems to smooth the minor pain that I feel when I rotate my forearm. I am sure I am not supposed to sleep with it (and I didn't) but I do feel that my arm was less painful during the overnight and I would have to assume that had something to do with the use of it during my waking hours. I do hope this continues to provides some help on the way to healing the affected area.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McElyea

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended but the sleeve sometimes rolls down around ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended but the sleeve sometimes rolls down around the bicep area and makes it a little uncomfortable and have to keep readjusting it.
customer_reviews.author: usmcfabian

customer_reviews.title: Works great for forearm/elbow pain!
customer_reviews.text: Both the sleeve and the brace have given me a lot of relief for tennis elbow. I've worn both anytime I even think I will lift anything - even a jar. Just wearing the sleeve (I followed the instructions to measure for the right size) even makes my forearm and elbow feel better. I found the velcro on the elbow brace adhere better with the close away from the body. Thank you for a product that actually does what it offers.
customer_reviews.author: EABurke

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for what i needed them for
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I was having shooting pains in my forearm everytime I would curl or squeeze tight onto a bar (or anything for that matter). These compression sleeves have completely eliminated that pain. Only concern I had is that I ordered the large and I can barely get the sleeves on... I have to remove them for a few min halfway through my workout to get circulation to return and then put them back on. But definitely 5 stars for the effectiveness!!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: The best of the products I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many over the counter braces and creams and ice bags etc. but nothing seemed to take away the constant pain that tennis elbo...tendon problems seem to embrace. This WIMI really does help. I don't know why but it is made differently than the rest of the wraps I have tried. I don't have to worry about bumping my arm as the protection it offers is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gailbreath

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Used it while playing tennis and i thought it was working well.. Then borrowed another friend of mine his elbow brace and i noticed the difference right away. i ould not recommend this for tennis elbow.. there are better braces out there
customer_reviews.author: Sumit

customer_reviews.title: ***Updated***...Works fine, falls apart ***replacement being sent***
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. However, the sleeve is coming apart at the seam after about 2 months of use. I sent a message to the seller with no response. Update...Company did reply and is sending a replacement. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I play three times a week comfortably, plus playing golf other days with no problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brace myself. At the time, I could hardly play tennis for the pain in my elbow. Using the brace, I play three times a week comfortably, plus playing golf other days with no problem. The elbow pain isn't totally gone, but the brace and sleeve make it totally manageable. I'm very happy with it. Delivery and follow-up were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Russ H

customer_reviews.title: Forearm Strap poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The forearm strap is poorly designed. For an averaged sized forearm you cannot get enough adjustment from it. In addition, the plastic loops allow the straps to slip to the side.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Combo
customer_reviews.text: Great combo. My elbow joints bother me from time to time when playing tennis but this is really helpful in supporting it. The sleeve is really good to wear all day too if necessary, really comfortable and relieves any stress on the arm.
customer_reviews.author: CTran

customer_reviews.title: I wear it bowling with extra wrist support and all is fine. Actually when I bowl I wear your ankle ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually I've been wearing it every day. I can use a manual can opener with ease. I injured the arm and elbow bowling...I wear it bowling with extra wrist support and all is fine. Actually when I bowl I wear your ankle brace and knee brace as well. Sometimes I wear your wrist brace. Just picture my right side. I like the products because they are light weight, comfortable and help.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for Tennis Elbow
customer_reviews.text: I had a nagging elbow paing and finally went to the doctor after a couple of months.. My Dr diagnosed tennis elbow. I purchased this product and wore it during my workouts after 1 week of rest. I am healed and do not need it anymore. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cones

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value and does work. Only one caveat I would say that I have experienced with many velcro type braces: I live on the coast, it is very hot and humid mid-july, by the 3rd set of a tennis match (even with the sleeve) the effectiveness of the velcro was an issue. It was wet and wasn't holding as it did earlier in the match. Again, I expected this, but as a male sweat is always an issue and the velcro is unfortunately affected on the elbow brace. This setup did help immensely and my elbow felt so much better post match!! All in all, great value and product.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This product is Great and I look forward trying out more of her ...
customer_reviews.text: Emily is a top notch entrepreneur who runs a very customer service oriented small business! This product is Great and I look forward trying out more of her high quality products! Very Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PR by the owner of the company who sent ...
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months of use, I believe this combination has helped alleviate my tennis elbow. Excellent PR by the owner of the company who sent out an email after I bought the package. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because the velcro sometimes doesn't hold if not fastened exactly right. It's likely designed for someone with a larger forearm. Nonetheless, I still use it every time I play pickleball, and I'm quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived timely and was exactly as described. Easy to get on and off. The compression sleeve in combo with elbow brace is very helpful in supporting healing. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great brace but a little small
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great brace. I've used it for 3 days while doing fairly demanding work (pouring concrete and splitting firewood) and it helps a lot. It seems very well made and fits under clothing very easily. My only complaint is with the size. I measured my arm and it was in the medium size range but I can barely velcro a medium on. So if you measure near the top end on size range definitely go a size bigger but I still highly recommend this brace!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Reese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome healing thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.text: This really works. One week of ware and my pain level went from a 10 to a 3. Awesome healing thanks for a great product. I’m a fan.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials. Logo starts to peel off right away ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap materials. Logo starts to peel off right away. Strap is not stable and hard plastic stabs at you.
customer_reviews.author: Marco A Tapia Jr

customer_reviews.title: do yourself a favor and find a better product!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap cheap! Sleeve doesn’t compress squat! It’s made of extremely thin spandex and the band is so narrow it doesn’t hardly apply pressure except to a small area. I guess if you’re not a serious athlete this might work but for a serious athlete, do yourself a favor and find a better product!
customer_reviews.author: KS Hayseed

customer_reviews.title: Great brace for tennis elbow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brace. Great value, really good construction. Material keeps dry and breathes good. Very good fit. Manufacturer contacted me within hours of purchase to provide additional information on use. Brace works really well to keep pressure on elbow and temdons, without hurting.
customer_reviews.author: LROD from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The band is much slimmer and more comfy than the one my husband got from a therapist. He likes the sleeve because it is easier to wear under a dress shirt. Hopefully this will do the trick to solve the golf elbow!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Like most of the reviewers have stated, this elbow brace works very well. The sleeve was very tight so I emailed the company for an exchange. I was surprised that they didn't want the old one back. Instead, they were going to send me a larger size. The large sleeve fits perfect now. Thank you. Great product backed by great customer service. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Vinsanity

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: Arm sleeve very thin and the velcro on the wrap was pretty much shot in only four to five uses. I believe there are far better braces out there than this one...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like I'm noticing a difference.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on 1/5/17 used it same day. Then used it on 1/7 all day, usually when I wake up in the morning my elbow really hurts. When I woke up on 1/8 felt no pain. Used it to play baseball on1/8 usually my arm in pain when I catch a ball but today felt no pain in 9 innings.
customer_reviews.author: Ra

customer_reviews.title: Price good, product decent...
customer_reviews.text: Arm sleeve got a run in it within two weeks and strap brace is just OK...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I measured my arm and it fit great. I have been wearing for almost a week ...
customer_reviews.text: The products came just right. I measured my arm and it fit great. I have been wearing for almost a week and I love the sleeve. The brace I usually only wear when I am home but both are very comfortable and I feel as if they are helping with tennis elbow. I never give it a rest and still feel like it is helping with the daily pains when I am wearing it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered quickly and seems to be excellent quality for a great price. Sizes seem to run as stated, I wore a medium and it fits as expected. I've tried both on, but have used the copper sleeve the most. Haven't seen much if any improvement yet, but it's only been a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: RGC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great support for sore tendons
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sleeve and the extra tendon support band. It really works. It’s comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product - made well. This definitely helps the pain and stability issues that I have when picking up things with my left arm.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I wore it most of the weekend and on Monday I am not because my wrist and hand started to swell much like the other braces
customer_reviews.text: This is different than other tendinitis braces I have tried, it is supposed to be strapped on tendon with the bump on the pain spot instead of below it. It helps the pain with the compression a lot. I wore it most of the weekend and on Monday I am not because my wrist and hand started to swell much like the other braces. But on Monday my elbow is almost pain free, so it seem that it works faster than the other style of brace for this injury.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Rippel

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than name brands
customer_reviews.text: This compression sleeve is amazing. It is comfortable and does not loose it's stretch like some high end name brands. Easy to put on and take off. No problems washing it or caring for it. I like to wear it while working out to ease the discomfort of my elbow pain.
customer_reviews.author: M_user

customer_reviews.title: Great Relief from the pain of tennis elbow
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad tennis elbow from cycling (6,000 to 9,000 miles per year for decades). I've gone to physical therapy, taken pain pills, worn compression sleeves. This combination product gives me more relief than anything I've tried. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Helped
customer_reviews.text: This actually help to work and dont feel much pain. Is just a bit uncomfortable because of the materials is made. But over all is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: the elbow brace fits ok and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for his elbow pain. Delivery was fast. Our only issue that the sleeve didnt fit his arm, but he works out and so his arms are bigger then most. the elbow brace fits ok and works like a charm. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: LaDawn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be good materials, but the compression stocking was very tight ...
customer_reviews.text: Item returned. Appears to be good materials, but the compression stocking was very tight and the band was too large.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kreuzman

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tennus elbow and bought this because of its grrat reviews! I used it last night for the first time. So far, no pain today. I also loved the personal email from the owner. It was a nice touch that you usually don't get these days! I'm all for supporting small businesses!
customer_reviews.author: T Kong

customer_reviews.title: Buy for the brace not the sleeve
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve was to tight for the measurements it was supposed to be for was replaced and same thing of to small but the brace does work well
customer_reviews.author: nicholas atkinson

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and wonderfully made
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and wonderfully made! The sleeve support feels good and the strap is sleek, secure and not bulky. I actually can wear both under my slim fit dress shirts and suits very discretely. Most importantly customer service is superb! Emily has been involved in making sure I get the most out of my Elbow Brace and Compression Sleeve. I highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Spenc

customer_reviews.title: Loving It!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It is durable and lightweight. Love that it's a combo pack. I have tendonitis in my arm and this sleeve feels good enough to wear all day at work. Gives my arm the compression it needs....would definitely but again!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I can not say for certain that the sleeve made the healing process faster but I am feeling better after one week of wearing the
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit after a Dr visit for Golfers elbow. I can not say for certain that the sleeve made the healing process faster but I am feeling better after one week of wearing the sleeve. The Brace was a little cumbersome when trying to put it on but after some work it be came rather easy. My only suggestion is to have proper instruction on how to put the brace and sleeve on would be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Alvarado

product_meta.title: WIMI Sports & Fitness 1 Tennis Elbow Brace for Tendonitis & 1 Elbow Compression Sleeve (1-Count) - Eases Tennis Elbow - Golfers Elbow & Arm Pain + Provides Relief & Support for Sore Muscles & Tendons
feature_bullets: 👋 GOOD BYE PAIN, HELLO RELIEF - Get back out playing the sports that you love quicker as our tennis elbow brace for tendonitis can help support your movement, flexion and improve overall utility. Excellent for those suffering from carpal tunnel elbow, tendonitis, bursitis, golfers elbow and tennis elbow.

😎 2-in-1 SOLUTION FOR TENDONITIS PAIN RELIEF – Tennis elbow pain can be a thing of the past with our 2-in-1 complete solution. The tennis elbow support works in tandem with our tennis elbow compression sleeve. **** For one low price you get 1-count tennis elbow band, 1-count tennis elbow sleeve and 1 digital ebook (emailed).

💫 MADE FOR COMFORT – WIMI Sports & Fitness is proud to bring you the best products with comfort and innovation in mind. Both our copper-infused compression sleeve and tennis elbow brace are designed to soothe you and feel natural to wear. Lightweight and breathable, our elbow compression brace system is perfect for summer and for any activity: crossfit, tennis, golf, rowing, baseball, weightlifting, you name it!

🎯 TARGET PAIN – The WIMI elbow braces have been designed to target the areas where you are experiencing the most pain. Easily adjusted and secured right where you need it. Always a comfortable fit with its soft design and wide inner gel pad that soothes & supports sore muscles!

👍 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Feel instant relief or your money back, no questions asked! **** For one low price you get 1-count tennis elbow brace with compression pad, 1-count tennis elbow sleeve and 1 digital ebook (emailed).
